content: bbbbaaaabbbbyyyy bbbbooooyyyy oooorrrr ggggiiiirrrrllll ssssuuuunnnn hhhhaaaatttt this top-down hat is an easy knit if you can yarn-over yo knit 2 together k2tog and make a new stitch m1 you can make this hat in just a few hours i used make one left m1l but any method will work just be consistent my hat has a 14 5 inch circumference and should fit a 3-6 month old baby materials 1 ball dk weight yarn i used rowan pima cotton dk in salsa 50gr 140yds size 5 double point needles size 4 double point and circular needles stitch marker darning needle directions on sz 5 needles cast on 8 stitches divided over 4 needles join for working in the round knit 2 row even begin pattern for crown of hat row 1- *yo knit 1* repeat to the end of row row 2- knit all even numbered row until the crown of hat is complete row 3- *yo knit 2* row 5- *yo knit 3* row 7- *yo k1 yo k1 k2tog* row 9- *yo k1 yo k2 k2tog* row 11- *yo k1 yo k3 k2tog* row 13 and all additional row *yo k1 yo k4 k2tog* see note continue knitting pattern until you have 80 stitches 20 on each needle note- if you want a larger size the top of the hat bigger than 80 stitches row 15 would be * yo k1 yo k5 k2tog* you continue to add 1 knit stitch after the * yo k1 yo until the top of hat is the desired circumference change to size 4 needles dpns or circs depending on your size choice knit all stitches even for 2 inches again if you are making a larger size decide how tall you want your hat to be and subtract ½ purl the next 4 row i added a sock yarn with elastic held together with my dk yarn to give the hat a snugger fit brim if you re still using dpns switch to a 16 circular needle and place marker at the beginning of round as soon as you have enough stitches row 1- *k4 m1* repeat to end of row knit the next 2 row row 4- *k5 m1* to end of row knit the next 2 row row 7- *k6 m1* to end of row knit the next 2 row row 10- *k7 m1* to end of row knit the next 2 row if you want a larger brim continue in established pattern to the desired width finishing bind off all stitches i like elizabeth zimmerman s sewn binfoff but any method will do weave in ends find a good baby head sized bowl turn it upside down and block hat add icord ties if you like
